notesStmt.note: An account of Castlemaine's arrest and trial for high treason during the period of the Popish Plot.
Page 2 is taped; p. 20 is torn; p. 43-44 are tightly bound, and p. 92 is misnumbered in filmed copy. Beginning-p. 55 photographed from Cambridge University Library copy and inserted at the end.
Reproduction of original in Newberry Library.
